About Me

Hey there! I’m Maijs Garais (my’s gah-ruhys, IPA: /maijs garais/; I also go by Mai for short), a highly motivated and enthusiastic student at the University of Leeds studying Computer Science. I’m still exploring and trying to find out what branches of computer science I’d like to pursue as a career, but I have worked as an Android developer in the past and am currently deepening my understanding of web development.

You can find me on LinkedIn and GitHub.

Site information

This site is powered by Jekyll, a static website generator. The CSS is Bootstrap v5.0, with a few tweaks by me.

The coding and writing is done on VS Code. Landing page photo shot on a Zenit.
